EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1339083750.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1339083750.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jim, I apologize for my delay in getting back to you. I’m glad to hear the you think MBO is a good option for you to run your consulting business. Please get back in touch with me when you are ready to get started and in the meantime we will keep you in our system so you will receive invites to webinars we are doing and other information about independent consulting for your knowledge. The reason for my delay is I wanted to make sure I had a correct answer for you regarding the home office question. When it comes to how much you claim for home office space, there is a great document I have attached that can guide you through how you can claim your home office. Let me know if you still have questions after reviewing this, but it touches on employees who use a home office as their primary office and it seems it is determined by a number of different factors. There is a flow chart that asks you questions and will tell you whether or not it is allowable. Please let me know if you have any additional questions about this! Thank you,Nicolette From: Jim De Piante [mailto:jimdepiante@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2012 7:17 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up Nicolette, I have looked over the web site very carefully and this looks like a good option for me. I plan to get started in early 2013 so will be back in touch. I don’t think we will need to get together just yet. In the meantime, I do have one question: Do you have any information on tax treatment for home office when one participates with MBO Partners? Specifically, can the deduction be taken fully (as a business) or only to the extent that it exceeds 2% of AGI (as an employee). Kind regards, Jim De Piante ( +1 (704) 455-8855 * jimdepiante@gmail.com <mailto:jimdepiante@gmail.com> From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Thursday, May 24, 2012 3:57 PM To: jimdepiante@gmail.com <mailto:jimdepiante@gmail.com> Subject: MBO Partners Follow Up Hi Jim, It was a pleasure speaking with you today (although very briefly), thank you for your interest in MBO Partners! Please schedule a convenient time for us to speak using my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVhUsUJm4v2XNqzNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you soon, have a great Memorial Day Weekend! Regards, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&bbentley@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVhUsUJm4v2XNqzNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVhUsUJm4v2XNqzNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
